Welcome.title: Welcome
Welcome.description: Speak with Nikkolas, he should be in the townhall
preQuestDialogue: Hello! We saw your application for the job. You are welcomed to the Abyssal Key island
From now on it's the start of your trial period.
The situation on the island is quite worrying -
fish populations are collapsing, waters are polluted by factories, and the locals are divided between survival and sustainability.
Your goal is to make choices that will determine the island's future.
Talk to me when you will be ready to start.
Right now you can go to the seashore next to my house, north-east of the island and meet my friend Jorge. He will introduce you to your first quest.
completionDialogue: Hi, nice to meet you! Talk to me again if you want to try something new.

Fishing.title: Fishing
Fishing.description: Meet Jorge next to Nikkolas's house
preQuestDialogue: Hello! I'm Jorge, a local fisherman. For fifty years I've watched this island changing, and I've seen how overfishing has made things tougher for everyone. I always try to fish in a sustainable way, but it means less food and money these days. Would you like to join me today? Choice: yes/no.
Fish sustainably in approved areas. It's better for the ocean, but you'll catch fewer fish and earn less profit - go to the furthest ocean (1).
Fish in restricted zones. There are more fish here, but it harms the environment and breaks the rules - go to the nearest ocean (2).
You put a worm on your hook. Drop the line into the water. Wait for a fish to bite...
You've got a fish! Add to inventory? Choice: yes/no
Wow, you've got another fish! Choice: yes/no
Three in a row? Amazing! 3 good fish you got there. Choice: yes/no
No more luck today... Return to Jorge.
completionDialogue: Jorge: Good job! Thank you for your help. One of my friends is also waiting for you, you can find him on the boat.
Jorge: I would have chosen the other way, but thank you anyway! I know someone you might like; you can find him near the ocean with preserved corals and animals.
